com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.file

Class HttpFileService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.AbstractHttpService
      • com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.file.HttpFileService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpService, Service<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>

    public final class HttpFileService
extends AbstractHttpService
    An HttpService that serves static files from a file system.
    See Also:
    HttpFileServiceBuilder

      • orElse

        public HttpService orElse(Service<?,? extends HttpResponse> nextService)
        Creates a new HttpService that tries this HttpFileService first and then the specified HttpService when this HttpFileService does not have a requested resource.
